![](E:/Academic/Fudan/bio/me.jpg)

My name is Jingjing Han. I am an Associate Professor at <a href="https://xwxy.fudan.edu.cn/NewsEn/">the School of Journalism at Fudan University</a>.</p>

My research focuses on dynamic changes of cognitive and emotional processing during human-human and human-machine/media communication，using the complex dynamic systems framework as the primary approach.</a>.</p>

I currently serve the Vice chair elected of <a href="https://infosysica.org/">the Information Systems Division of ICA</a>, and Associate Editor of <a href="https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/journal/15516709">Cognitive Science </a>.</p>

I obtained my Ph.D. in media arts and sciences at the Media School of Indiana University Bloomington.</p>
